title: Art courses could help medical students become better clinical observers

title_detail.value: Art courses could help medical students become better clinical observers

summary: In an effort to explore ways to improve clinical observation skills among medical students, researchers found significant improvement in observational recognition skills among students who took an art observation course and demonstrated that art training could help teach medical students to become better clinical observers.
